tk.luminos.luminoscore.graphics.display

Class GLFWWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.luminos.luminoscore.graphics.display.GLFWWindow

  • public class GLFWWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    The GLFWWindow class initializes GLFW and OpenGL contexts.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Nick Clark

    • Constructor Detail

      • GLFWWindow

        public GLFWWindow(java.lang.String title,
                  boolean vsync,
                  boolean fullscreen,
                  boolean visible,
                  boolean resizable,
                  boolean vismouse)
           throws LuminosException
        Parameters:
        title - Sets the GLFW Window's title
        vsync - Determines whether the window utilizes Vertical Synchronization
        fullscreen - Determines whether the window and OpenGL Viewport is fullscreen. Overrides the Width and Height if true
        visible - Determines if the window is visible on load
        resizable - Determines if the window is resizable
        vismouse - Determines if the mouse is visible when window is in focus
        Throws:
        LuminosException - Constructor that initiates the GLFW and OpenGL contexts, as well as the window itself
